description.value:
This fine copper kettledrum has a dark skin stretched over it, and the tension rods are stained a dark red. This drum grants you a +2 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with the instrument.

Activateâ€”Sustain Dread 1 (auditory, emotion, fear, manipulate, mental)

Frequency once per day

Effect You beat a march on the timpani that continuously increases in tempo. Enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[will|dc:26|options:area-effect,inflicts:frightened] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The target can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 round.

Failure The target can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.
